entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Don't cut the briefings, they are needed and very necessary. You on the other hand are not, so keep the briefings but cut yourself out. Trust me you won't be missed !
